Player History
Drafted in 6th round, 158th overall pick, by Cleveland in 2008...
Injured on 7/13/2008 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/11/2014 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Cleveland on 4/14/2015...
Signed as a free agent by Kansas City on 3/1/2017 to a minor league contract.
Earned first career win on 4/7/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/31/2021, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Had first career hit (double) on 6/3/2022, off Bill Lee Jr. (STL)...
